description: Ramsey Town Commissioners wants to increase its size, but neighbouring Lezayre is against the idea.
title: Ramsey expansion plan 'totally opposed' by Lezayre
title_page: Ramsey expansion plan 'totally opposed' by Lezayre - BBC News
maintext: Under Manx law, an application to extend the boundary of an authority must be made to the Department of Infrastructure before it can be approved by Tynwald.
